articles.description: Brazil and Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr feels "less and less" like playing football because of the repeated racist abuse he has suffered.
articles.title: Vinicius feels 'less like playing' over racist abuse

articles.description: Wales are braced for a huge match on Tuesday as they take on Poland in their Euro 2024 play-off final at Cardiff City Stadium.
articles.title: Wales braced for huge Poland Euro play-off final

articles.description: England and Harlequins scrum-half Danny Care announces his retirement from international rugby.
articles.title: England's Care retires from international rugby

articles.description: Declan Rice says it will be a "pinch me" moment as he captains England on his 50th appearance in Tuesday night's friendly against Belgium at Wembley.
articles.title: England's Rice set for 'pinch me' moment against Belgium

articles.description: Nottingham Forest lodge an appeal against their four-point deduction for breaching Premier League profit and sustainability rules, the club confirms.
articles.title: Forest lodge appeal against points deduction

articles.description: Andy Murray says he will be out for "an extended period" following the ankle injury he sustained at the Miami Open.
articles.title: Andy Murray: Briton 'out for an extended period' with ankle injury

articles.description: The footballer, who was jailed for rape last month, is temporarily released after posting €1m bail.
articles.title: Dani Alves: Ex-Brazil footballer set to be released pending appeal

articles.description: Louis Rees-Zammit is meeting with a number of NFL clubs after showcasing his skills during the league's Pro Day.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Ex-Wales rugby star to meet Super Bowl winners Kansas City Chiefs and Denver Broncos

articles.description: Luke Littler is increasingly appearing on our TV screens off the oche as well as on it - but how is the teenage darts sensation adapting to the limelight?
articles.title: Luke Littler: How darts' new star handles huge demand on and off the oche

articles.description: Elite British sportswomen share their experiences on the cost of living crisis, maternity and social media trolling as part of a BBC study.
articles.title: Elite sportswomen chasing medals on 'less than minimum wage'
